_source.short_desc: Grow your people pipeline, build authentic and long-lasting relationships, and source and hire the right people with LeverTRM.
_source.long_desc: Lever is a leading Talent Acquisition Suite that makes it easy for talent teams to reach their hiring goals and to connect companies with top talent. Lever is the only platform that provides all talent acquisition leaders with complete ATS and robust CRM capabilities in one product, LeverTRM. Lever supports the hiring needs of over 5,000 companies around the globe including the teams at Netflix, Spotify, Atlassian, KPMG, and Nielsen.
_source.target_audience: Lever is the only platform that provides talent acquisition leaders with a complete applicant tracking system (ATS) and candidate relationship management (LeverCRM) platform in a single solution.

related_products.short_desc: ZipRecruiter simplifies applicant tracking. Easily manage, screen, and rate candidates, or integrate your own ATS.
related_products.features:
Rated #1 by employers in the U.S.*, ZipRecruiter simplifies applicant tracking, letting you easily manage, screen, and rate candidates. The dashboard allows you to view profiles, resumes, cover letters, and more. You can even integrate your own applicant tracking system so your team can use the systems they know to seamlessly post jobs. 

*Based on Trustpilot rating of hiring sites with over 1,000 reviews.

related_products.short_desc: ADP Workforce Now is a human capital management solution for companies with more than 50 employees.
related_products.features:
The core capabilities of the solution are human resources management, payroll, benefits, talent management, compliance, time & labor management, analytics & benchmarking. 
The fully integrated suite is built on a single database, which automates data synchronization across different components and helps users to minimize manual administrative tasks. The platform also integrates with other HR and business applications via the ADP Marketplace and APIs.

related_products.short_desc: Streamline your application tracking and recruitment management with monday.com Work OS, the fully customizable no-code work platform.
related_products.features: Streamline your application tracking and recruitment management with the help of monday.com Work OS, the fully customizable, no-code work platform. Build more efficient HR management workflows with clever features such as automations, integrations, real-time collaboration, file sharing, and visual dashboards. Centralize all applicant information, make data-driven hiring decisions, keep employees productive, and work smarter together in one place.

related_products.short_desc: BambooHR ATS is designed to help organizations find, evaluate, and hire the right talent as quickly as possible.
related_products.features: BambooHR gives organizations the capacity to grow and change based on the people they bring on board. By casting your hiring net wider with integrations to top job boards and social sites, reviewing candidates the instant they apply, and quickly coordinating with hiring team members, the BambooHR Applicant Tracking System helps HR professionals and hiring managers find, evaluate, and hire the right talent as quickly as possible.

related_products.short_desc: Rippling ATS gives you the power to find, develop, and engage top talent, all in one modern platform. See it in action today!
related_products.features:
Rippling ATS makes it easy to find, hire, onboard, and engage top talent. It automates posting to job boards, streamlines scheduling, and makes it easy to build any report you need. Then, when you hire someone, Rippling automates the admin work to get them set up.

Take onboarding, for example. With Rippling, you can just click a button, and in 90 seconds set up a new hires payroll, health insurance, 401K, work computer, and apps  like Slack, Zoom, and Office 365.

related_products.short_desc: Affordable, easy-to-use ATS with texting. Start free trial and post jobs today. No cc required! Up and hiring today! Mobile friendly!
related_products.features: ApplicantStack helps hiring teams and SMBs that need to quickly reach more candidates. Application pre-screening isolates the best candidates immediately. Keep them engaged with auto emails, texting and interview self-scheduling. Extend an offer before your competition. New hires can onboard from their phone. Collaborate remotely with your team in real time. JobTarget integration posts to 20K+ job boards. Expand your reach & organize your process with a powerful ATS thats intuitive to use.

related_products.short_desc: Breezy's the #1 ATS on Capterra for a reason. It helps you automate time-sucking tasks so you can focus on hiring great employees.
related_products.features: There's a reason Breezy is the most highly rated ATS on Capterra. We simplify your entire hiring process by eliminating time-sucking, repetitive hiring tasks. Just sign-up and with a few clicks, you're advertising open jobs on the best job boards and attracting candidates. From there, Breezy helps you automate everything from identifying the top candidates, emailing (or texting), and scheduling interviews with them all the way through to sending them offers for signature. You'll love it.

related_products.short_desc: Make hiring easy with our complete recruiting and onboarding solution.
related_products.features: Applicant tracking software for HR professionals.  Paychex features automated job postings, design your own hiring robot, no paper onboarding, and more.

related_products.short_desc: Automate every part of the recruiting lifecycle with Bullhorn's recruiting software built for staffing and recruiting agencies.
related_products.features: Bullhorn is the global leader in software for the staffing and recruiting industry. More than 10,000 staffing companies rely on Bullhorn's cloud-based platform to drive sales, build relationships, and power their staffing processes from start to finish. Headquartered in Boston, with offices around the world, Bullhorn is founder-led and employs more than 950 people globally. To learn more, visit www.bullhorn.com or follow @Bullhorn on Twitter.

related_products.short_desc: The market's most advanced end-to-end recruitment ERP.
related_products.features: JobDiva is the global leader in Talent Acquisition, Talent Management and Applicant Tracking technology, delivered as an AI-powered SaaS solution to the staffing and recruiting industry. JobDiva combines a Customer Relationship Management (CRM) application, synchronization with all major job boards and VMS providers, BI analytics, automated 24/7 resume harvesting, a Mobile App and the largest resume database in the world.

related_products.short_desc: Cloud-based human resources solution that helps businesses streamline workforce planning, talent management, and payroll processes.
related_products.features: Workday HCM is a single, cloud-based solution for workforce planning, talent management, and payroll processes. The solution is used by Fortune 500 and G2k companies to operate with agility and efficiency, and for organizations to be ready for whatever comes next. Unlike rigid HR systems or point solutions, Workday HCM delivers a skills-based HCM foundation and continuously innovates to enable customer success as the impact of technology, alternative work arrangements, and employee expectations evolve.

similar_products.short_desc: BambooHR ATS is designed to help organizations find, evaluate, and hire the right talent as quickly as possible.
similar_products.features: BambooHR gives organizations the capacity to grow and change based on the people they bring on board. By casting your hiring net wider with integrations to top job boards and social sites, reviewing candidates the instant they apply, and quickly coordinating with hiring team members, the BambooHR Applicant Tracking System helps HR professionals and hiring managers find, evaluate, and hire the right talent as quickly as possible.

similar_products.short_desc: JazzHR is on a mission to make recruiting and hiring easy, effective, and affordable, no matter what growth looks like at your company.
similar_products.features: JazzHR is powerful, user-friendly and affordable ATS & recruiting software that over 10,000 growing businesses trust to find their next great hire. JazzHR replaces manual hiring processes like using email and spreadsheets with an intuitive ATS that helps recruiters & hiring managers build a scalable recruiting process that sources more qualified candidates, faster.

similar_products.short_desc: As the fastest-growing hiring platform in the industry, Greenhouse delivers a complete solution to help companies hire for what's next
similar_products.features:
Greenhouse delivers a complete solution to help companies hire for what's next. As the fastest-growing hiring platform in the industry, thousands of leading companies like DoorDash, Dropbox and Wayfair use Greenhouse's intelligent guidance to design and automate all aspects of hiring. 

Greenhouse Recruiting drives engaging candidate interactions at every touchpoint, eliminates administrative burden and keeps everyone on the hiring team engaged.

similar_products.short_desc: Recruitee is the number one collaborative hiring software to build winning teams.
similar_products.features: Recruitee delivers the complete solution to help internal HR teams work with the rest of their organization to hire better, together. As an easy-to-use collaborative hiring software, thousands of scaling businesses like Taco Bell, M&S, and Staples have used Recruitee's recruitment management and applicant tracking system to find, interview, and hire the best talent. More than 181,000 users from 5000+ companies are using our software to hire the best people!

similar_products.short_desc: ClearCompany Applicant Tracking is designed to give your hiring team the tools they need to hire the right people quickly.
similar_products.features: ClearCompany is the easiest-to-use Applicant Tracking System (ATS) you'll find. ClearCompany has empowered thousands of companies to attract, screen, and hire better talent, engage their team, and use strategic insights to keep their recruiting competitive. From candidate sourcing, automated screening, grading and interview scheduling, to easily building talent pools, EEO/OFCCP compliance reporting and much more, ClearCompany gives you everything you need to find, hire and engage "A Players."

similar_products.short_desc: Jobvite is a comprehensive talent acquisition-focused suite that brings together every aspect of recruiting. Watch a quick demo!
similar_products.features: Jobvite is a comprehensive, full suite talent acquisition provider. Our Evolve Talent Acquisition Suite brings together every aspect of recruiting - from recruitment marketing, applicant tracking, and onboarding to employee referrals, internal mobility, DE&I and advanced analytics. Jobvite's single, unified solution empowers recruiters, hiring managers, TA leaders, and candidates to put experience first throughout the entire talent acquisition lifecycle.

similar_products.short_desc: The Applicant Tracking System designed for in-house Talent Acquisition and HR teams, with unlimited support included.
similar_products.features:
Pinpoint is an Applicant Tracking System designed for in-house talent acquisition and HR teams at organisations making between 15 and 5,000 hires per year.

We help you attract, hire, and retain more of the best people while reducing recruitment costs, and automating your admin.

Our customers:

- Attract 4 x more qualified candidates
- Spend 80% less time on admin
- Make hires 40% faster
- Reduce recruitment agency spend by 83%

similar_products.short_desc: Easy-to-use applicant tracking software that will allow companies to take control of their recruiting and hiring process.
similar_products.features: AcquireTM takes applicant tracking to the next level making it easy for HR, Corporate Recruiters and Hiring Managers to fully manage the hiring process. AcquireTM is a modern applicant tracking solution with tools like texting, video interviewing, Interview self-scheduling, job posting syndication and an easy mobile experience for applicants. As an integrated talent management suite, AcquireTM can also manage what comes next, offer letters, onboarding, learning and performance management.

similar_products.short_desc: Create more human experiences for all talent and unlock the skills and potential of your global workforce.
similar_products.features: Beamery's Talent Lifecycle Management platform allows enterprises to create more human experiences for all talent, and unlock the skills and potential of their global workforce. We help organizations identify and acquire top talent, move the needle on DE&I, close key skill gaps and retain top performers.

similar_products.short_desc: The recruitment and employer branding ATS. Get all the tools you need to manage your candidates and craft the perfect career site.
similar_products.features:
The applicant tracking and recruitment software. The modern way to attract, nurture and hire top talent. Grow faster by focusing on what matters most - your candidates.

Designed to help recruiters and HR managers track job applications, you'll strengthen your employer brand and revolutionise your recruitment process, all in one platform. Use unique features such as automated triggers, anonymous hiring, GDPR compliancy and an easy-to-build, interactive career site.

similar_products.short_desc: HireRoad is the modern talent acquisition and eLearning software of choice for millions of users globally.
similar_products.features:
HireRoad is the modern talent acquisition and eLearning software of choice for millions of users globally. 

Our HR Recruit applicant tracking system (ATS) and HR Learn learning management system (LMS) help you build better organizations faster. Attract, hire, onboard, and train the right people so they thrive in your organization. 

Accelerate and automate your hiring processes with the only ATS that features an unlimited use, built-in video screener; self-scheduler for candidates.

similar_products.short_desc: Breezy's the #1 ATS on Capterra for a reason. It helps you automate time-sucking tasks so you can focus on hiring great employees.
similar_products.features: There's a reason Breezy is the most highly rated ATS on Capterra. We simplify your entire hiring process by eliminating time-sucking, repetitive hiring tasks. Just sign-up and with a few clicks, you're advertising open jobs on the best job boards and attracting candidates. From there, Breezy helps you automate everything from identifying the top candidates, emailing (or texting), and scheduling interviews with them all the way through to sending them offers for signature. You'll love it.

similar_products.short_desc: Streamline recruiting so you can attract and engage top talent, match them to their perfect role, and become a productive team member.
similar_products.features: Cornerstone' skill-based matching creates seamless recruiting experiences for hiring managers, recruiters, and candidates. By leveraging one holistic system to create customizable job reqs and manage and view the hiring process, hiring teams can continuously improve recruiting and onboarding journeys.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Human Resource software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Human Resource tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Human Resource software, also known as a Human Resources Information System (HRIS) or Human Resources Management System (HRMS), enables an organization to manage employee records and information. Human Resource Management software allows you to organize contact details, department, attendance, salary, training, benefits and more. Many Human Resource Management systems and resource management software also interface with applicant tracking and payroll software. Human Resource Management software is related to Applicant Tracking software, Payroll software, Performance Appraisal software and Workforce Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Job Board software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Job Board tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Job Board software helps companies advertise open positions internally and externally. It can be offered as a stand alone application or be integrated with existing company website. The recent trend in Job Board software is to integrate with social networks for social hiring. Typical features of this software include applicant tracking, email integration, and search tools that help match candidates with appropriate positions. For related software solutions see Applicant Tracking software and Recruiting software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Onboarding software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Onboarding tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Onboarding software eliminates the need for paper forms and automates workflows associated with getting a new hire up and running with the company.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Performance Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Performance Appraisal tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Performance Management software automates the process of reviewing employee performance, setting new objectives, and writing individual development plans. A type of Performance Management solution is 360 degree feedback software, which manages the process in which an employee completes a self-evaluation and is also evaluated by their manager, peers, and direct reports. Performance Management software is related to 360 Degree Feedback software, Human Resource software and Workforce Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Recruiting software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Recruiting tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Recruiting software helps recruiting, staffing and hiring agencies manage their operations by maintaining a database of applicant and job information. These solutions are used by organizations to collect applicant information and then filter, grade and match candidates skills against job requirements. Recruiting software is related to Applicant Tracking software, Human Resource software, Talent Management software and Workforce Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Reference Check software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Reference Check tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Reference Check software streamlines and automates the process of requesting and collecting job references. There are two types of Reference Check software. In the first type, candidates provide their referees? contact information to recruiters who then reach out to the referees through Reference Check software. The second type of software is a platform accessible by referees, candidates, recruiters, and HR professionals that allows candidates to reach out to the referees and collect references directly.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Talent Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Talent Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Talent Management software gives employers the tools to accurately manage, evaluate, and compensate based on employee performance. By tracking performance and standards, Talent Management software allows companies to create and maintain a high-performance workforce. Key features of this type of software include employee learning, compensation evaluations, policy compliance, and succession planning, all of which help companies manage personnel growth. Directories related to Talent Management software are Human Resource software, Performance Appraisal software, Succession Planning software, Training software, Workforce Management software, and Applicant Tracking software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Video Interviewing software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Video Interviewing tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Video interviewing software speeds up and simplifies recruiting by eliminating the need for multiple in-person interviews.
